channel.title: Interaction detection on Gertjan Verhoeven
channel.description: Recent content in Interaction detection on Gertjan Verhoeven

item.title: Interaction detection using Random Forest predictions
item.description: Comparing the predictions of a Random Forest model with the predictions of an Linear Regression model can inform us in what ways the OLS model can be improved. Here we explore the feasibility of this approach by modelling the classic Boston Housing dataset.
